body_html: AFAIK, the build start by deleting any leftover build directory and this seems to be failing with Permission denied errors. Do we deprivilege before running a build? (Is that what with_the_same_user is meant to do?)
body_text: AFAIK, the build start by deleting any leftover build directory and this seems to be failing with Permission denied errors. Do we deprivilege before running a build? (Is that what with_the_same_user is meant to do?)
body: AFAIK, the build [start by deleting any leftover build directory](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/39582974/regarding-the-tensor-shape-is-1) and this seems to be failing with `Permission denied` errors. Do we deprivilege before running a build? (Is that what [`with_the_same_user`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/56eb8376260ef0ddb6389920dabc7f636d21cbff/tensorflow/tools/ci_build/builds/with_the_same_user) is meant to do?)
